name: 爱与痛的边缘
summary: Laura是个单身的新闻工作者，住在墨西哥城市里的小单位。经过长期的放肆玩闹，他遇见了Arturo。於是他们开始在床上寻找激烈的，热情的性浪漫，并夹杂了各种压力，痛苦和爱。 Laura lives deep in the melancholy of her troubled past in Oaxaca. Her solitary days pass until she decides to end it all. Laura meets Arturo who that will help her finish off the pain of her existence.
